segments.text: Yes , Jason , right ? Nice to meet you . Welcome to Taiwan .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks , good to meet you , too .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You had a long flight , you must be tired .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , and the food was horrible !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , sorry to hear that . But , don worry ! Taiwan has plenty of great things to eat . First , lets get you to the hotel .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Great ! How will we be getting there ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My car is in the parking lot , lets go this way . Let me help you with your bags .
segments.speaker: S2
